Pre-Game Insights: Both sides failed to win the opening match of Group B
Egypt narrowly avoided a shocking loss to Mozambique in their AFCON opener, salvaging a point with a late penalty goal from Mohamed Salah
Ghana faced defensive issues in a 2-1 loss to Cape Verde, prompting our bet on Salah and company
Ghana seems to be in mixed form with little effort to resolve the limited free flow of goals
It will cost them this time as the tournament is fired up and every big player in the continent is pushing for reaching the knockout stages
Miscellaneous Highlights: The AFCON 2023 match between Egypt and Ghana will be on Thursday, 18th January 2024, 8:00 PM (GMT); Friday, 19th January 2024, 1:30 AM (IST) at Felix Houphouet Boigny Stadium
The AFCON 2023 match between Egypt and Ghana will be telecasted in India on Fancode
You can live stream this match on Fancode App
The live telecast of the match will be on Sky Sports in UK
You can watch Egypt vs Ghana live on beIN Sports in USA
Live streaming of this match in Nigeria will be available on NTA
Others: Omar Marmoush eyes a start, and Mohamed Abdelmonem is a yellow card away from suspension
Egypt is expected to go all out against the Black Stars
